item.title: End of Moon and Hare story
item.summary: !nanni concludes the legend of the Hare and the Moon in which the Hare has told the Moon that the people and others must really die.
item.comments: 1) p.10 027 opp: !nanni heard this from his paternal grandfather (Karu), 2) This story is a continuation of another, see The Moon and the Hare and |xue (Tamme) in Books XI & XII-8, 3) See also Moon and Sun and Hares and Story of the Moon and the Hare: a version at first by ≠kasin and then by Dia!kwain (in |xam Book IV-4) and The Moon and the little Hare (in |xam Book II-6), 4) This story is found in Book XI
item.author: !nanni (XI)
